contentrichtext.text: '''Qingyupu District''' ([[Chinese character|Chinese]]: 青云谱区; [[Pinyin]]: Qīngyúnpǔ Qū), is a district of [[Nanchang]], the capital of [[Jiangxi]] Province, [[China]]. It covers over 40 square kilometers and as of 2004 had a population of 240,000. ==Administrative divisions== It is divided into 5 areas: *Sanjiadian (三家店) *Hongdu (洪都) *Jingshan (京山) *Xujiafang (徐家坊) *Daishan (岱山) and 1 town: *Qingyunpu (青云谱镇) ==External links== *[http://218.64.17.195/mutli_ipp/Index.shtml Nanchang Qingyunpu District Government Web(Chinese)] {{County-level divisions of Jiangxi}} {{coord|28|35|N|115|55|E|region:CN-36_type:adm2nd_source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:Nanchang]] [[Category:County-level divisions of Jiangxi]] {{Jiangxi-geo-stub}}
